scripts.about:start: Runs the node server. Rememeber to build the application first with the build script before using this command.
scripts.build: webpack build --config ./config/webpack.config.js --config-name server --stats-error-details --env mode=%npm_config_environment% && webpack build --config ./config/webpack.config.js --config-name client --stats-error-details --env mode=%npm_config_environment%
scripts.about:build: Builds the server and then the client bundles. When running 'npm run build' use '--environment=<production or development>' to specify build mode. Defaults to development.
scripts.about:dev: Runs the server, but watches for changes in files and restarts when detected any. You'll need to rebuild to see changes as well.
